name: Idly Hexed
description:
[The game will contact an external server upon game load to confirm the universal time.]

You start with a forest. A perfect place to lure new victims to for your newly founded Murder Club. All you have to do is click - click - click...
But what to do with the bodies? And their souls, they also seem to linger...
Perhaps there are more dark forces that could use some idle assistance?

This game is fully mouse-controlled. The game saves automatically, and idle progress is maintained between sessions. A "give it to me now" cheat exists, speeding up time x50, but is only available on request - or you could find it yourself.
